data.md:MetaData: Pollen profile BREDCOUN, Brede Bridge, United Kingdom
Centre of floodplain. Core diameter: 10 cm. Floodplain mire, peat overlain by alluvi. Physiography: floodplain. Surrounding vegetation: arable and some pastoral farming.
Flandrian vegetational history of south-eastern England. Stratigraphy of the Brede valley and pollen data from Brede Bridge
